resources.string: This a short bio about myself. I am a father of two, a husband of one and simultaneously working two jobs and going to school. Do I get tired, not really, although I am overwhelmed, I will still do my best to accomplish all my tasks! I love work, I love my Family, I love School and my professors and mostly, I love God!.
ðŸ¥‰ I love taking care of my Family and Friends
